20110109024120.000|20110109024120.000|CC1|             [ Pam ]

20110109024215.000|20110109024215.000|CC1|   [ Marlo ] ST. JUDE HAS MADE  
20110109024215.000|20110109024218.000|CC1|     IMPORTANT ADVANCEMENTS

20110109024218.000|20110109024221.000|CC1|     TO TREAT BRAIN TUMORS.     
20110109024221.000|20110109024221.000|CC1| MORGAN WAS REFERRED TO ST. JUDE

20110109025653.000|20110109025655.000|CC1|      IT CANNOT BE CANCER.

20110109025657.000|20110109025658.000|CC1|    THEY WERE WAITING FOR US.   
20110109025658.000|20110109025658.000|CC1|     THEY RAN ALL THE TESTS     
20110109025658.000|20110109025700.000|CC1|          FOR STEPHAN.          
20110109025700.000|20110109025700.000|CC1|        AND IN 24 HOURS,        
20110109025700.000|20110109025704.000|CC1|      THEY HAD THE RESULTS.     
20110109025704.000|20110109025704.000|CC1|           [ Stephan ]          
20110109025704.000|20110109025706.000|CC1|    THEY SAID IT WAS A TUMOR.   
20110109025706.000|20110109025706.000|CC1|  IT WAS THE DESMOPLASTIC ROUND 
20110109025706.000|20110109025712.000|CC1|CELL TUMOR, SO IT WAS VERY RARE.
20110109025712.000|20110109025712.000|CC1|  ONLY 200 PEOPLE IN THE WORLD  
20110109025712.000|20110109025714.000|CC1|            HAVE IT.            
20110109025714.000|20110109025714.000|CC1| [ Patty ] 200 KIDS IN THE WORLD
20110109025714.000|20110109025718.000|CC1|     THAT HAVE THIS CANCER.     
20110109025718.000|20110109025721.000|CC1|       IT'S 20% SURVIVAL.       
20110109025721.000|20110109025721.000|CC1| [ Marlo ] AT ST. JUDE, DOCTORS 
20110109025721.000|20110109025725.000|CC1|   KNEW THEY HAD TO MOVE FAST   
20110109025725.000|20110109025729.000|CC1|     TO SAVE STEPHAN'S LIFE.    
20110109025729.000|20110109025729.000|CC1|   HE HAD MULTIPLE TUMORS THAT  
20110109025729.000|20110109025732.000|CC1| SURGEONS SUCCESSFULLY REMOVED. 
20110109025732.000|20110109025732.000|CC1| BUT THIS WAS JUST THE BEGINNING
20110109025732.000|20110109025735.000|CC1|          FOR STEPHAN.

20110109025740.000|20110109025742.000|CC1|               ? ?              
20110109025742.000|20110109025742.000|CC1|           A FEW WEEKS

20110109025744.000|20110109025744.000|CC1|           STEPHAN GOT

20110109025755.000|20110109025755.000|CC1|  [ Marlo ] STEPHAN'S BEST HOPE 
20110109025755.000|20110109025757.000|CC1|     FOR LONG-TERM SURVIVAL     
20110109025757.000|20110109025759.000|CC1|   IS A BONE-MARROW TRANSPLANT  
20110109025759.000|20110109025759.000|CC1|    MADE FROM CELLS HARVESTED
